channel.title: Pages on We'll Have To Look At The Data
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on We'll Have To Look At The Data

item.title: About
item.description: About I’ve made this website to further a hobby, and I’ll use it to put up some things that I’ve been doing with data, visualisation, etc that I’ve found interesting - mostly using the R programming language. It might not be interesting to anyone else at all, but I hope that others might be able to take something from here and further their own understanding. I have no background in programming or data science - everything on here, I’ve tried to learn myself and by following examples from the many, many excellent blogs and forums out there.
